title: Upatre
extract: Upatre is a trojan that belongs to a downloader family that usually arrives on an infected machine through malicious spam emails with .zip attachments. The Upatre malware downloads further malicious files, such as password stealer malware.Feb 13, 2015
extract_html: Upatre is a trojan that belongs to a downloader family that usually arrives on an infected machine through malicious spam emails with .zip attachments. The Upatre malware downloads further malicious files, such as password stealer malware.Feb 13, 2015
